derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: probably an alteration of dialect sade, from Old English sadian 'become sated or weary' (related to sad). The change in the final consonant was due to association with satiate

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+satiate[v.使饱足,生腻]→adj.不知足的,欲壑难填的
sati足够,饱足+able能……的→adj.可满足的
sate=sati足够,饱足→v.使心满意足,使厌足
sati足够,饱足+ate表动词→v.使饱足,生腻
